channel.title: Comments on: When The Other Woman’s An Xbox

item.title: By: Foton
item.dc:creator: Foton
item.description: From MTV's past experiences with Kansas residents, I had assumed that Kansas had a particularly high percentage of crazies. I can see now that I had grossly underestimated.
item.content:encoded: From MTV’s past experiences with Kansas residents, I had assumed that Kansas had a particularly high percentage of crazies. I can see now that I had grossly underestimated.

item.title: By: UnionCarbide
item.dc:creator: UnionCarbide
item.description:
Rather unsurprisingly, it turns out that once MTV came calling, <a href="http://us.gizmodo.com/gadgets/gaming/the-truth-behind-girls-against-video-games-139612.php" rel="nofollow">the attention whores came out of the woodwork</a>. It seems that now that MTV has left town, the Girlfriends Against Videogames group's traffic evaporated.
It's times like this I'm glad I married a woman that can kick my ass at Tiger Woods golf. :)
item.content:encoded:
Rather unsurprisingly, it turns out that once MTV came calling, the attention whores came out of the woodwork. It seems that now that MTV has left town, the Girlfriends Against Videogames group’s traffic evaporated.

It’s times like this I’m glad I married a woman that can kick my ass at Tiger Woods golf. ðŸ™‚
